name: Dodge It (Destus Gamez)
description:
Yo what's up guys 😁✌🏽. 

I got inspired to make this game after watching a Crab Gane video on YouTube. 

It's basically blocks falling down and you dodge them by me now ng left and right. It's endless btw

CONTROLS

Mobile: Press the left or right part of your screen to move

PC: A - move left

          D - move right

Note the leaderboards need an internet connection to submit and display scores. 

Video of how I made the game above

Have fun✌🏽
